      • createTestList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> createTestList(int num_points,
                                                                        boolean integers,
                                                                        boolean negative)
        Create a list of numbers.
        Parameters:
        num_points - Number of points in the list.
        integers - True - List contains integers. False - List contains doubles.
        negative - True - Negative numbers are included. False - Only positive numbers.

      • compareResults

        public void compareResults(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> point_list,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> test_points)
        Given a list of points used to create a kdtree and a list of search_points, test that the results of searching this kd tree match a linear search.
        Parameters:
        point_list - A list of points used to construct kdtree.
        test_points - List of search points to test.

        Print a list of points to stdout.

      • tearDown

      • linearSearch

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> linearSearch(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> list,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> point)
        Find the closest point in a list to a given search point. Uses a simple linear search that iterates over every point and calculates the distance between the test and search point.
        Parameters:
        list - List of points to search over.
        point - Point to search for.

      • testBuildTree

        public void testBuildTree()
        Builds a kdtree.

      • testSearchCustom

        public void testSearchCustom()
        Nearest neighbor search for a custom list of points. Tests kdtree against a linear search for a correct distance between the search point and its nearest neighbor.

      • testSearchRandomIntegerPos

        public void testSearchRandomIntegerPos()
        Nearest neighbor search using a test set of random integers over a kdtree of random integers. Tests kdtree against a linear search for a correct distance between the search point and its nearest neighbor.
        Parameters:
        -

      • testSearchRandomDoublePos

        public void testSearchRandomDoublePos()
        Nearest neighbor search using a test set of random doubles over a kdtree of random doubles. Tests kdtree against a linear search for a correct distance between the search point and its nearest neighbor.

      • testSearchRandomIntegerNeg

        public void testSearchRandomIntegerNeg()
        Nearest neighbor search using a test set of random integers over a kdtree of random integers with negatives included. Tests kdtree against a linear search for a correct distance between the search point and its nearest neighbor.

        Nearest neighbor search using a test set of random doubles over a kdtree of random doubles with negatives included. Tests kdtree against a linear search for a correct distance between the search point and its nearest neighbor.
